Now mine eyes shall be open, and mine ears attent unto the prayer that is made in this place."

God has consistently placed this song in my heart since yesterday. I kept humming it. Only this song since yesterday. I trust God is planning to do something in our lives. I'm expectantly looking forward to the manifestation of God's purpose. It shall come to pass. Though it tarried, I shall wait for it. I believe it shall not tarry. God, kindly show Your sovereignty.

"I will cause the shower to come down in his season; there shall be showers of blessing"...Ezekiel 34:26
The showers are coming down when the sovereign God of the universe deems the time.

As I was praying this first day of the year, this song was placed in my heart along with others. Really my family and I need showers of blessings as well as every believer. God's blessing comes in so many forms but it is gratifying to note that even the mercy drops that fall on us is so great and refreshing. So as we pray for showers, God will surely rain it down on us and it will be a great year. May God's name be praised for this wonderful provision. Amen.

Truly "Mercy-drops round us are falling, But for the showers we plead"

Suddenly, this song, "there shall be showers of blessing" came in, and dominated my heart. I tried to sing it, but I didn't know the full package. Then I tried Google and succeeded. I thank God for His gift unto mankind. I also appreciate the vessels that God used to make this message, full of life and hope available to the world. Thanks again! I'm blessed!

Dear Lord we ask for a soothing rain of Your blessings over every drought in our lives. We trust Thee for abundance of rain! Quench our thirst O Lord, rain Your mercy on Your people. O Lord, let our land bring forth fruit for righteousness. Amen.

Just like the children of Israel in Zech 10:1 "Ask rain of Jehovah / At the time of spring rain, / Of Jehovah who makes the lightning, / And He will give them showers of rain, / To everyone herbage in the field". Rain signifies blessings.To ask for more rain is to seek more blessing. Thus, in this verse the Lord is encouraging the children of Israel to seek more blessings while He would be favorable to them. While the Lord is so favorable to us, we should ask Him to send us even more favor. Since God is giving us showers of rain, we should ask Him for more rain. This indicates that we all need to pray for the Lord's abundant blessing.
